text:
@AndrewScheer Maybe you should look at the numbers, Andrew - Canada's standing in the international fight against Covid-19 is pretty good. Also, you said, "Conservatives have put forward constructive solutions to help Canadians."

What are they? All I've seen from your party is sniping.
